45
Types of Non-Ontological Resources
Sabou et al. 2007

Hodge 2000
 Terms Lists
• Authority files
• Glossaries
• Dictionaries
• Gazetteers
• Lexicons
 Classification and categories
• Subject headings
• Classification schemes, 
• taxonomies and

 Relationship lists

Maedche et al. 2001
 Text
 Dictionary 
 Knowledge base
 Relational schemata
They do not take into account the 
Non-Ontological Resource 
data model, an important artifact 
in the re-engineering process.
